remarks: Limit of a constant ` C ` minus each term of a sequence. (Contributed by NM, 24-Sep-2005.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 9-Feb-2014.)
statement:
climadd.1 $e |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) $.
climadd.2 $e |- ( ph -> M e. ZZ ) $.
climadd.4 $e |- ( ph -> F ~~> A ) $.
climaddc1.5 $e |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) $.
climaddc1.6 $e |- ( ph -> G e. W ) $.
climaddc1.7 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( F ` k ) e. CC ) $.
climsubc2.h $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( G ` k ) = ( C - ( F ` k ) ) ) $.
climsubc2 $p |- ( ph -> G ~~> ( C - A ) ) $.
$d A k $.
$d C k $.
$d F k $.
$d G k $.
$d M k $.
$d Z k $.
$d k ph $.
